```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(here)
library(ggpubr)
source(here(list.files(path = here(), pattern='*cfg*')))
source(here('src', paste0(prj.specs$prj.prefix, '_lst_dtafiles.R')))

opts_chunk$set(echo=F) 
options(scipen=999)
opts_chunk$set(tidy.opts=list(width.cutoff=80), tidy=TRUE)

seed_day <- as.integer(ymd('2020-11-06'))

set.seed(seed_day)
```


# Dataset  

```{r input}
df <- readRDS(here('prj_dbdf', dta.names$f_cpt_list[5])) %>%
  select(sample, size, method, starts_with('smd'))

des_df(df, 'Results', c('sample', 'size', 'method'))
```

# Prepare table for reporting  

## Compute variance  

```{r summ_var, echo=T}
# compute variance by method, size
df_summ_var <- df %>%
  group_by(method, size) %>%
  summarize_at(vars(starts_with('smd')), .funs = list(~sqrt(var(.)))) %>%
  arrange(size)
```

## Compute percent change  

```{r pcent}
summ_anysize_prec <- df_summ_var %>%
  select(-size) %>%
  group_by(method) %>%
  summarize_all(mean) %>%
  rename_with(.fn = str_replace, .cols = starts_with('smd'), pattern='smd_', replacement = 'prec_')

df_summ <- df_summ_var %>%
  group_by(size) %>%
  nest() 

df_summ$pcent_chg <- map(df_summ$data, get_pcent_chg)

df_pcent <- df_summ %>%
  select(size, pcent_chg) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  unnest(cols = pcent_chg) %>%
  rename(Method = method)
```

## Figure 1  

```{r fig1sep}

fig_1_a <- ggplot(df_pcent, aes(x = size, y = smd_e_tot, group = Method)) +
  geom_line(aes(color = Method, linetype=Method)) +
  scale_color_brewer(palette="Set1") +
  theme_bw() + 
  labs(y= '',
       x= '') 
fig_1_b <- ggplot(df_pcent, aes(x = size, y = smd_e_adj, group = Method)) +
  geom_line(aes(color = Method, linetype=Method)) +
  scale_color_brewer(palette="Set1") +
  theme_bw() + 
  labs(y= '',
       x= '') 
fig_1_c <- ggplot(df_pcent, aes(x = size, y = smd_e_str, group = Method)) +
  geom_line(aes(color = Method, linetype=Method)) +
  scale_color_brewer(palette="Set1") +
  theme_bw() + 
  labs(y= '',
       x= '') 
fig_1_d <- ggplot(df_pcent, aes(x = size, y = smd_e_unadj, group = Method)) +
  geom_line(aes(color = Method, linetype=Method)) +
  scale_color_brewer(palette="Set1") +
  theme_bw() + 
  labs(y= '',
       x= '') 
```

## Combine plots  

```{r, message=F, warning=F}
fig_1all <- ggarrange(fig_1_a,
          fig_1_b,
          fig_1_c,
          fig_1_d,
          ncol=2, nrow=2, labels = c("A", "B", "C", "D"),
          common.legend = T, legend = "bottom")
```

```{r }
ggsave(here('output', 
            paste0(prj.specs$prj.prefix, '_fig1all_', 
            timestamp(), '.jpeg')), height=5, width=8, dpi=150)
```
